Package dev.todoapp.infrastructure

package dev.todoapp.infrastructure
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationEnvironment
    An application can be deployed into multiple environments (staging, production, ...).
    DockerRepository
    Provisions an ECR repository for Docker images.
    DockerRepository.DockerRepositoryInputParameters
     
    JumpHost
    A stack that deploys an EC2 instance to use as a jump host (or "bastion host") to create an SSH tunnel to the RDS instance.
    JumpHost.JumpHostInputParameters
     
    Network
    Creates a base network for an application served by ECS.

    Network.NetworkOutputParameters
     
    PostgresDatabase
    Creates a Postgres database in the isolated subnets of a given VPC.

    PostgresDatabase.DatabaseOutputParameters

    Creates an ECS service on top of a Network.

    SpringBootApplicationStack
    This stack creates a Network and a Service that deploys a given Docker image.
